summary: A player home in a valley.(LightVer Available)
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][size=5]Still work in progress, so far the house and exterior have changed a lot. You still need to download the new .bsa file in the final version, but you can still use this version, I think it has all functions except crafting stuffs storage...
But I suggest waiting for the final version:)[/size][size=5][size=5]

FullVer: FPS killer.
LightVer: FPS friendly.[/size][/size]

[color=#ff0000]FPS(when facing the house):
GTX850M FullVer: 10 LightVer: 30[/color]

[color=#ff0000]Location[/color]: Solitude dock, find the boat. Also the map marker is visible.

Features:
[size=4]Masters room X2
Followers room X2
Children room(beds X6) X1 (adoption friendly)
Bathroom
Living room X2
Kitchen
Dinning room
Farmland
Lighthouse
Garden
Onsen
Children playground
Underground library
A lake for Excalibur[/size]
Not very detailed but get all crafting stuff placed:
[size=4]Skyforge
Alchemy lab
Those shelf in these two places can't be activated yet[/size][/size][size=5]
Working at now:
[size=4]Underground library 1F: will change it to an armory later
Beach
A new lake at waterfall[/size][size=4]
[/size]
MOD used in Screenshots(taken in SSE):
Climates Of Tamriel: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?
Enhanced Lights and FX: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?
Simply bigger trees: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56877/?
Excalibur: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85215/?

Special thanks to:
Bee9999: [size=5]CK[/size] Teacher.
archimagekhan:  Helped me a lot with those functions I don't know.

Credits:[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Antistar (chandelier, spiral stairs, painting, tap, wallpaper textures, clock, tap and clock scripts from Clockwork  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77809/?)[u][color=#0066cc]
[/color][/u] archimagekhan
